thread.title: GOP Women Have A Message For ‘Day Without Women’ Strikers, and It’s BRILLIANT…
thread.title_full: GOP Women Have A Message For ‘Day Without Women’ Strikers, and It’s BRILLIANT…

author: Nickarama
title: GOP Women Have A Message For ‘Day Without Women’ Strikers, and It’s BRILLIANT…
text:
Today was the International Women’s Day. 
It was also the day that leftists chose for “A Day Without Women” to strike and not go to work or to school. 
Here’s a sample of one of their posters:   
Here are some of the highlights.  1'); }); 
12 leaders were arrested in NYC for blocking one of the busiest traffic circles in the city, enraging the public even in that deep liberal enclave. 
A man lead the event in Washington, D.C. proving that yes, it was ‘a day without a woman’ there. 
Sen. Elizabeth Warren tweeted that she would not be skipping out of work and got a terrific response.   
Proving that the leaders behind this are braintrusts, there’s this tweet:  1481811813211-3'); }); 
Who birthed the other half? 
The obviously on-the-ball Nelini Stamp was a leader in Occupy New York as well and the group that she works for used to be ACORN. 
The Tempe Republican Women thought of a creative way to respond to the leftist festival. 
They took the original poster and vastly improved it. 
Nice work, Tempe!
